snippet: The rebound came as investors picked up stocks that had fallen the most over the previous three days.
abstract: Stock market rises modestly, breaking its three-day losing streak.
lead_paragraph: The rebound came as investors picked up stocks that had fallen the most over the previous three days.

headline.main: Utilities and Technology Help Shares End 3-Day Slide
